definition: engaged in as a pastime, someone who pursues a study or sport as a pastime
details:
adjective
- engaged in as a pastime
= example: engaged in as a pastime
= synonyms: unpaid
- lacking professional skill or expertise
= example: lacking professional skill or expertise
= synonyms: unskilled
noun
- someone who pursues a study or sport as a pastime
- an athlete who does not play for pay
